answers.answer: Have they gotten your blood pressure to come down?
Thank you, i appreciate it. And noo, it won't go down :( They've taken soo many exams to find out why i have high blood pressure and no answers and so many medications!
I hope they'll be able to help you. Have they said anything about giving baby steroids for the lungs incase they have to get him out? He'll be really tiny but he does have a good chance of survival.

yes they gave me sterroids quickly. Im still in here. it's my fifth day -_- ihave no one. i dont have family nor friends. So it's getting harder to keepmy pressure under control because im falling into depression. and to top it off mybaby daddy ccheated on me here at the hospital with another girl while i was up here in pains... :"( stress over stress... i just want to leave :(

question: went in for my daily doctor appointment yesterday morning. was pretty excited because right after i had a ultrasound with my specialist. Well, that didnt go as planned. My blood pressure was sky high. Automatically, sent me to the hospital to be admitted. And a day later. I'm still here. I'm still praying my preeclampsia doesnt turn into Eclampsia within these couple days admitted. i cant have my baby boy out yet. :( Hes 25 weeks today.  Toooo risky!! Dont want to take that chance!
title: Anyone with a familiar story?
